name: Mokens League
description: Mokens League is a casual to mid-core real-time multiplayer esports metaverse. The platform features a series of traditional sports video games in a free-to-play / play-to-own mode. They use blockchain technology and NFT characters to elevate ownership in video games and offer the chance to win tokens in what we call a Win-to-Earn gameplay mechanic. Here is a list all the games that we will publish as we move forward, Soccer (Already live and downloadable), Padel, Racing, Brawler, Darts, Badmington, Tennis.
